page.title: 05Recreation
page.content: Many people are attracted to this open country for recreation. Activities include footpath walking in the wooded countryside all year round. In the summer there are caravan rallies & scout & guide camps. Fishing is available to clubs & there is stabling & grazing for horse riders. The West Kent hunt meets regularly in Winter & has point to point meetings in Spring. Local people can enjoy tennis, cricket & stoolball. All gather socially in both pubs. There is an active over 60's club. Many make gardening a hobby & join the local Garden Society. Residents have access to a wide variety of clubs & interests including{Women's Institute,}Church & Sports activities in local towns & neighbouring villages.
